text: Barmas is a locality on a foothill near Gilgit city, in Gilgit-Baltistan. It is one of the oldest settlements in the district Gilgit.Barmas Gilgit Dadi Jawari â€“ the Queen who gifted water to her subjectsoperation begins in Gilgit ==References== Category:Settlements in Gilgit-Baltistan
title: Barmas Gilgit
